An und für sich ein tolles Spiel. Wird meist zu zweit als Survivor gespielt und macht daher dann natürlich auch durch das bessere Teamplay etwas mehr Spaß.

Warum das ganze also negativ bewerten?
Das Spiel an sich ist NICHT negativ zu bewerten. Allerdings macht die Spielerschaft dieses negative Gefühl. Da meine ich nicht mal die T-Bagger, Toxic Gamer usw. (die fluten ja jedes Spiel, Hallo Internet). Das Problem ist das Verhältnismäßig viel gecheatet wird. Mindestens 2/10 Spielen laufen nicht fair ab, das ist zu viel.

So wird dann teilweise die eine oder andere Session früher beendet, weil man dann einfach keinen Spaß mehr daran hat. Exploit-User können gemeldet werden, die Wahrscheinlichkeit, das diese aber Konsequenzen zu befürchten haben, ist sehr gering.

Fluent, no issues and fun. Fact that there is no voice communications, means no toxic communities ( moreless). Resetting of the level, giving chance to newbies to start at any point and keep the game in balance.

Repetative gamestyle, but various locations and different boost, upgrate dynamics balance the theme.

Wish to have some small bunch of friends to comment on the run via discord maybe would put more joy. But still the game by itself is enough fun. :)

Ужасно нестабильная игра после каждого обновления. 
На читеров разработчики не реагируют никак. 
Система ммр - это как религия: можно верить, можно нет - на игровой процесс не влияет.

I remember four years ago or so when I bought the game using Christmas earnings, and it took me three years to even be able to run it. Just this year, got a PC hefty enough to do so.
That said, was it worth the wait?
Not nearly.

I'm not gonna sit here and pretend that a "toxic" community is a huge problem in of itself, it really isn't, and people who act like it is likely invest too much time in chat/forums over the gameplay itself.
However,
What is, objectively, a problem, is the devteam only listening to one side of the toxic community, but only listening to them on balance changes and continuing forward with their ass-backwards decisions that aren't directly impacting the game itself, stuff like PR management. Either listen to the community or don't, but don't only hear out half of the community on balance they have literally no idea about while you shut your ears entirely on everything else they talk about.

Now, I could talk for hours about how BHVR's design is inherently survivor-sided, with it being a 4v1 and all where the 4 team just has to scatter and hold M1 while occasionally tapping spacebar. 
I could talk about how it's the increasingly entitled survivor side of the community they listen to, who seem to think that they should be effortlessly afforded victory (even more than they already are) simply for having purchased the game and choosing the team that doesn't have a literal weapon. 
I could talk about how the resulting effect is already weak killers being made even weaker via nerfing their Ultra Rare add-ons, even if those add-ons aren't particularly broken or even strong, just because some random survivor player somewhere tweeted at BHVR saying they don't like playing against it, even though killer players have to endure a slew of completely unfun gameplay inherently because they chose to play killer, making killer META more and more enclosed and restrictive.
I could even talk about how "face camping" isn't a viable strat if the survivors genrush and don't just throw themselves aimlessly at the person being camped,

But literally none of those are the root problems with Dead by Daylight.
They're a symptom of the disease that BHVR has mutated into.
And I'm sure, intrepid reader, that you'll probably read all of that and hand-wave it away, think to yourself or aloud, "You're just a filthy killer main, you don't know anything about anything besides how to tunnel and camp", but that's missing or ignoring the point entirely.

This isn't a Survivor V Killer issue.
This is a development issue.
And it's a crying shame, because DbD has such good bones, such solid lore, such an interesting core concept, but it's impossible to ignore all the glaring, crater-sized issues in how it's being run.

TL;DR, spend your money on a game that won't take what you bought and nerf it into the ground within a week of a single person complaining about it.
I'm fully willing to face an onslaught of tribalists ignoring the core point and rabidly dissecting my thought-crimes against the Church of Survivor, and I'll even hear them out, but for those of you willing to read objectively, comments are open, discussion is encouraged.

A creative game , i was keep playing for two years.

I started playing this game over a year ago and its been a wild ride! The best way to play is in a group, and being able to communicate makes it infinitely more fun. Sometimes matchmaking is a little rough, but as long as the people you are playing with and against aren't toxic, most matches aren't terrible.   

There however is the unfortunate reality that most killers are playing without the survivors game experience in mind. New players that don't know how the game works and intense try-hards invite tunnelling players out of the game to get a secured kill, camping the hook to ensure constant hook pressure and slugging players and leaving them to bleed out. Im not exactly sure the devs can fix those problems by penalizing killers that do this, especially since it may be a natural part of the game and our request is more about etiquette. They do offer perks that solve this; DStrike/borrowed time help with tunneling, borrowed time/guardian with camping, and unbreakable/exponential for slugging. That doesnt mean the game is fine, but there are things you can do to protect yourself.   

Overall 9/10, as I obviously don't play anything else

まず初めに言っておきますが、私はこのゲームが大好きです。

キラー専で遊んでいますが、確かに冗談かと思うほどひたすらサバ優遇、
そもそも意思疎通のない4人対1人という前提のゲーム性だったはずなのに
いまやVCパーティーが当たり前、初心者サバイバーに合わせた環境で
熟練サバイバーのVCパーティーになんて当たった日には全逃げ＆煽りなんてしょっちゅう、
しかもキラーにはキャンプトンネルはマナー違反だの、ゲームシステム以外にも
縛りが課され、一体どちらが殺人鬼なのか分からない状態です。

私がそれでも楽しいと感じられるのは、
上記の不満より見つけて追いかけてころころする快感の方が大きいからです。
つまりこのゲームでキラーを楽しめるのは私のような変態か、くっそ不遇な環境の中で
煽られることに快感を感じられる変態かどちらかでしょう。
サバイバー側は知らん。

・最後にキラーを始める人へ
書かれている人もいますが
名前が「数字の羅列」「漢字だけ」の場合は抜けましょう。
かの国のやつらはまともな方が少ないので時間の無駄です。

「サバイバーの複数が似たような名前」の場合もやめときましょう。
パーティーです（全員ひらがなの名前とか）

始めたての頃はパーティーを相手にするとなす術がないので
ちょっとでも臭いな、と思ったらプロフィールを閲覧し
そいつのフレンドに今参加しているサバイバーがいないかチェックした方が良いです。

in one sentence : ignorance is bliss
i've had this game since beta and absolutely love the idea and have lots of fun when playing with friends, if you're new to the game and dont take the game super competitively then this game is so much fun
once you begin to put more hours you begin to realize the developers dont care about the game being balanced and dont fix bugs
the content put into the game is always exciting and refreshing and overall i have to give this game a good review because i keep coming back
basically, play this game for fun - try not to learn to much or take it too seriously, you'll find yourself hating it more and more
